Thu, 06 Feb 2025 03:13:23 +0000 Kahutia Bowling Club president Anaru Tamanui and his team have been busy preparing for the Aotearoa Māori Bowls national championships being played on greens throughout the district over the weekend. "Everything is beautiful, ready for the arrival of the players today," he said on Thursday. "We are all looking forward to it." Photo / Murray Robertson
